final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Treatment_Chambers
        subgraph Doctors
            A[Enter short-term treatment]
            B[Evaluate the condition of patient]
            D[Treat patient]
            E[Prescribe medicines]
            F[Prescription delivered]
        end
        subgraph Technicians
            C[Test the patient in laboratory]
        end
    end

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> D
    B -.->|Assessment performed by medical doctor and nurse| C
    D -->|Performed by medical doctor and nurse| E
    E --> F
    E -.->|Issue medicine prescription| F
